response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to revolutionize your industry. This exceptional piece carries a significant value to us, but I understand its true worth may be different to you. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with unparalleled benefits while ensuring a substantial return on your investment. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any way I can assist you in making your decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
